meeting_sections.section_name: RECOGNITION - CLASSIFIED EMPLOYEE OF THE MONTH
meeting_sections.section_name_raw: 2. RECOGNITION - CLASSIFIED EMPLOYEE OF THE MONTH

items.item_text: Recognition of Classified Employees Who Earned Permanent Employee Status in  2012  Recess:  The Regular Meeting will recess to a reception in honor of Cupertino Union School District’s Classified Employees Who Earned Permanent Employee Status in 2012.  The meeting will reconvene following the reception.
items.item_text_raw: 6.1  Recognition of Classified Employees Who Earned Permanent Employee Status in  2012  Recess:  The Regular Meeting will recess to a reception in honor of Cupertino Union School District’s Classified Employees Who Earned Permanent Employee Status in 2012.  The meeting will reconvene following the reception.

items.item_text: Consent items are considered to be routine by the Board of Education and will be enacted in one motion.  If discussion of any of the items is required, they may be removed from Consent and considered separately.
